title: Write unit tests for YouTube service (youtube.ts)
description: Test searchSong() with mocked yt-search: found/not-found cases, retry logic across query variations. Test buildPlaylistUrl() with empty/single/many IDs. Test getSearchStats() accuracy. Test rate limiting delay.

comments.text: 21 unit tests for youtube.ts - all passing. Covers searchSong retry logic, searchSongs with progress, buildPlaylistUrl edge cases, getSearchStats.
